Serialized Form

  • Package view

    • Class view.ControlPanelMandelbrot

      class ControlPanelMandelbrot extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • colourMapCombo
          JComboBox<String> colourMapCombo
          Drop-down list for choosing the active colour map.
        • iterationSpinner
          JSpinner iterationSpinner
          Spinner used to adjust the maximum iteration count.
        • loadButton
          JButton loadButton
          Loads a saved Mandelbrot image.
        • redoButton
          JButton redoButton
          Reapplies an action that was previously undone.
        • resetButton
          JButton resetButton
          Resets the view and iteration count to defaults.
        • saveButton
          JButton saveButton
          Saves the current Mandelbrot image to disk.
        • undoButton
          JButton undoButton
          Reverts the last zoom or movement action.

    • Class view.MandelbrotPanel

      class MandelbrotPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • colourMap
          ColourMap colourMap
          Colour mapping strategy applied when rendering the set.
        • dragEnd
          Point dragEnd
          Current endpoint of the drag gesture for zoom selection.
        • dragStart
          Point dragStart
          Initial point of a drag gesture used for zoom selection.
        • model
          ModelMandelbrot model
          Backing model supplying Mandelbrot pixel data.
